channel.title: Unsupervised-learning on IO42 Learning to Learn
channel.description: Recent content in Unsupervised-learning on IO42 Learning to Learn

item.title: Go NEAT
item.description: This project provides implementation of NeuroEvolution of Augmenting Topologies (NEAT) method written in Go language. The Neuroevolution (NE) is an artificial evolution of Neural Networks (NN) using genetic algorithms in order to find optimal NN parameters and topology. Neuroevolution of NN may assume search for optimal weights of connections between NN nodes as well as search for optimal topology of resulting NN. The NEAT method implemented in this work do search for both: optimal connections weights and topology for given task (number of NN nodes per layer and their interconnections).
